title: SMC_ORIENTATION_MODE (Enum)
text:
TYPE SMC_ORIENTATION_MODE :
The orientation mode describes how the orientation is interpolated
for CP movements.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: GreatCircle
rows.Comment:
The orientation is interpolated from the start orientation to
the target orientation along the shortest path.
Even if the start and the target orientation are in the working
space, this interpolation mode may leave the working space.

rows.Name: Axis
rows.Comment:
The orientation axes are interpolated in axis space from their
start values to their target values.
This mode can be used to move through singularities of the orientation.
Coupled kinematics and position kinematics support this mode.
